title: So i accidentally played a ranked game
body:
Ranked was where draft should've been on the client this morning. I go into que, get into lobby, and im a little confused because we have a swain who takes clarity...the summoner spell. even though i told him swain usually builds roa, he ignored me and fed fiora. like every person on my team was doing atrocious except for my adc and I. 

I'm just like, "what? what's going on? I must have a long lose streak coming" then I see the problem- i played ranked! Explained everything.
